summary: THE METAL PART ON THE  CABLE CONNECTING BATTERY TO OTHER PARTS OF VEHICLE  CRACKED.  HAD STOPPED TO GET BATTERY CHECKED AND SERVICE PERSONNEL FOUND THE CRACK IN THE METAL PART ON CABLE THAT CONTAINS 2 FUSES.  CAR HAD BEEN  HESITANT ON STARTING TWICE IN THE WEEK.  SAFETY PROBLEM IF PART HAD BROKEN COMPLETELY INTO WHILE ON INTERSTATE OR IN AN AREA NOT HEAVILY POPULATED.   COULD HAVE CAUSED A SERIOUS IF NOT FATAL ACCIDENT.
